mapper.insert: insert into ecs_user_bonus (bonus_id, bonus_type_id, bonus_sn, user_id, used_time, order_id, emailed, supplier_id) values (#{bonus_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bonus_type_id,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{bonus_sn,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{used_time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{order_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{emailed,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{supplier_id,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update ecs_user_bonus set bonus_type_id = #{bonus_type_id,jdbcType=TINYINT}, bonus_sn = #{bonus_sn,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, used_time = #{used_time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_id = #{order_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, emailed = #{emailed,jdbcType=TINYINT}, supplier_id = #{supplier_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} where bonus_id = #{bonus_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select bonus_id, bonus_type_id, bonus_sn, user_id, used_time, order_id, emailed, supplier_id from ecs_user_bonus where bonus_id = #{bonus_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
